scripts.deployWin: set NODE_ENV=production && next build && next export && type NUL > ./out/.nojekyll && git add out/ -f && git commit -m "Deploy gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy: NODE_ENV=production next build && next export && touch ./out/.nojekyll && git add out/ -f && git commit -m "Deploy gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
